boardgame.description: ICE's now-out-of-print CCG (they lost their license to produce Middle-Earth products in 1999). Players take the role of the Istari, or Wizards - most familiarly Gandalf, Saruman, and Radagast, but also Pallando and Alatar - in the struggle against Sauron in Middle-Earth. Each player competes to bring the greatest strength to bear against the Shadow, including Factions such as the Riders of Rohan or the Great Eagles, allies like Gwaihir or Shadowfax, items such as the lost Palantiri, Glamdring, or Narsil, and the completion of various quests - from the relatively straightforward rescue of prisoners through the involved Reforging of the Sword that was Broken, restoration of the White Tree to Minas Tirith, or the quest of quests, the destruction of the One Ring._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players build decks in which half are composed of resource cards and half of hazards, dedicated to the stopping of your opponent. This is where the big bad guys come in, with cards for the 9 Nazgul, a couple of Dragons (Smaug being the recognizable one), Shelob, and the Balrog._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

A large collection of MECCG cards, all from the Wizards. There are several elements to this lot. First, the cards. There are a total of 2,254 with 1,451 from the limited edition and 803 from the unlimited edition. There are 15 rares and 197 uncommons from the limited edition; 5 rares and 85 uncommons from the unlimited edition. The specific rares from the limited edition include: Denethor II, Galadriel, Galva, Morgul Night, Storms of Ossk, Traitor, Dw. Ring of Durin’s Tribe, Easterlings, Palantir of Annuminas, The Mithril-coat, Carn Dum, The Stones, Variag Camp, and The Great Goblin (x2) The specific rares from the unlimited edition include: Lure of Power, The Precious, Lucky Search, and Tom Bombadil (x2) There is at least one of every common between the limited and unlimited edition (and multiples in most cases), all but one of the fixed cards between both editions, and all but 9 of the uncommons between both editions. Generally there are multiples of all commons, fixed, and uncommonns. I have a complete account of all the cards by edition in an excel format by request. This lot also include the handy box from the gift set (which is nice for storing, although can only hold half of these cards). Also included are the three booklets from the gift set (card list booklet; Rulesbook, and Tip Book), the map of Middle-Earth, the promotional hobbit figures, and 2 burning eye dice. Finally, there is the ICE book (#3333), Middle-Earth The Wizards Companion that includes rules, scenarios, card lists, etc. A quite handy reference. This is a pretty big collection of cards and game materials and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll send it securely in a USPS large priority mail box. Postage will be $12.

Brand new and sealed 10-deck Middle Earth Collectible Card Game display box of Challenge Decks. With over 1000 cards(!) the Challenge Decks are the perfect way to introduce yourself and your favorite gaming club to the beautiful, graceful and long out-of-print Middle Earth Collectible Card Game. This display contains 10 ready to play challenge decks - one for each Wizard and one for each of five different Ringwraiths. Each deck contains 110 cards selected to make it competitive while still exploring many of the rich, evocative themes of Middle-earth. Each deck contains 30 cards for a unique resource strategy, 30 cards for a unique hazard strategy, a 20 card sideboard, and a full complement of characters and sites. There are over 400 different cards in the ten decks - enough to give you the basic pool of essential cards needed to design and construct your own decks. I ship with USPS 2-3 Day Priority Mail and fully insure all packages for your safety and convenience.

The Starters and boosters have been opened but have *never been played* and are therefore in Near Mint (I am always cautious with Mint ratings). Starter boxes and their rules leaflets are present. Also present are the booster wrappers for every booster I described above. The 3 Starters are from 3 different fixed sets. I include a full list of the singles here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B8O1-tsUIxpATmp0VWVIWnpsZlE The price of the rare singles alone, from what I was able to ascertain in gwaihir.net (found 20 rare pricings), totals somewhere near 80€.
